response.overview: 11-year-old students prepare a play based on the fairy tales of Andersen. Their teacher insists that they have a "modern theme". In Andersen's fairy tale, an astronaut appears. To do this, they steal a spacesuit from a nearby school. The consequences fall on the main character Marga. The girl rethinks her behavior and regains the trust of her classmates.
response.title: Za edna troyka
